lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Although (variable life) appears to be a short-term financial instrument with death benefit, its first priority is to raise as much cash value as it can over the long period," said Ichiro Kono, managing director and chief actuary of Sony Prudential.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Managers said strong results are due to the loading of funds into the buoyant Tokyo stock market and into convertible bonds and attractive short-term instruments such as large yen time deposits.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Variables are also attractive to executives of companies who wish to receive them as retirement funds with options for settlement in annuities," Kono said.
